summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and address the causes of this failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The pricing page has the fastest load time, TTFB, and First Contentful Paint (FCP) among all pages. This indicates efficient optimization and resource management.
The blog page has a higher FCP than the pricing page, suggesting that the blog page might benefit from further optimization to improve user experience.
The homepage has a significantly higher load time than the pricing and blog pages, indicating potential optimization opportunities to enhance user experience.
